Module eu.lilithmonodia.winestock

Package eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.configuration

package eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.configuration
The package 'eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.configuration' contains classes related to configuration data handling for the WineStock application.

This includes:

  • Configuration: A record class that holds the necessary information to establish a database connection such as the host address, username and password. The class provides a method to read these details from a JSON configuration file named config.json.
  • Related Packages
    Package

    eu.lilithmonodia.winestock
    The main package 'eu.lilithmonodia.winestock' is the root package of the WineStock application.

    eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.data
    Deprecated.
    eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.database
    The package 'eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.database' manages the database operations needed for the WineStock application.
    eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.exceptions
    The package 'eu.lilithmonodia.winestock.exceptions' includes custom exceptions tailored to handle issues that may arise during the usage of the WineStock application.
